Name: Early Evening Fizz
Ingredients: 30 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass). POUR soda into drink slowly from a height in order to build a (Ramos Gin Fizz style) thick foamy head. Serve with a straw.
Review: Cognac, chartreuse, sloe gin and lemon juice served in a tall foaming fizz – its name inspired by the Morning Glory Fizz.
History: Created in 2015 by Nick Caputo at Sovereign Loss in Brixton, England
